text: Jacques-Alexis Thuriot known as Thuriot de la Rosière, and later as chevalier Thuriot de la Rosière, chevalier de l'Empire (1 May 1753 - 20 June 1829) was an important French statesman of the French Revolution, and a minor figure under the French Empire of Napoleon Bonaparte. Category:1753 births Category:1829 deaths Category:Presidents of the National Convention
title: Jacques-Alexis Thuriot de la Rosière
